attributes.action: Reconise the existance of tangling gnomes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tangling gnomes are ignored by 99% of the population. We think that this should change. Tangling Gnomes spend their lives tangling headphone and electrical wires.
People need to know how these wires get tangled.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
